episode.summary: In the conclusion of the mind-switching school trip arc, will Saaya get answers at last about Bossun and Himeko? Will Bossun and Himeko get their own minds back? And in a bonus story, Bossun and company are recast as loser adventurers in the fantasy game world of... Quest Dance! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オペレーション・ラブポーション
Operation Love Potion
Operation Love Potion
episode.summary: The club is asked by Suzu to help use a love potion on her father, with complicated instructions this might be a hard one for the team to pull off. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 椿ダサTオクガフカイ
Tsubaki`s Lame T-Deep Meaning
Tsubaki Dasa T Oku ga Fukai
episode.summary: Tsubaki`s hobby is making original T-shirt designs, but when his fellow Student Council members proclaim them "lame", he goes to his twin brother Bossun for a shot of creative advice. Then, Bossun`s love for a robot anime leads him to an otaku meet-up. Will he be able to fit in? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さぐりあうツッコミ
Seeking Out Tsukkomi
Saguriau Tsukkomi
episode.summary: When Switch brings out an invention that can read the minds of animals, he and the other members quickly find out that it can also read human minds! Then, Himeko has been recruited by Momoka to go on a TV show, where she has to battle a professional comedian in a war of zingers! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妹の気になるアイツが気になる兄
He`s Interested in the Sister and the Brother`s Interested in Him
Imouto no Ki ni Naru Aitsu ga Ki ni Naru Ani
episode.summary: Agata is normally protective of his younger sister, but his genius IQ goes out the window when he becomes convinced that Saaya and Tsubaki are in love with each other! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウンは天にあるので, 来たれ生徒会
Poop`s in heaven, so come, student council
Un wa Ten ni Aru no de, Kitare Seitokai
episode.summary: Bossun tries to answer when nature calls, but it seems the world is bent on keeping him away from a toilet. Then, Tsubaki comes to the Sket-dan for help on yet another art project, this time a Student Council recruitment manga! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: The last day of president
The Last Day of the President
The Last Day of the President
episode.summary: Tsubaki is going to be the new Student Council president, but will his campus crackdown lead to rebellion before he even takes up the post? Then, Agata is made to jump through hoops in order to get his kidnapped sister back on his last day as Student Council president! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天才ウンコマン慕情
Genius Poopman Yearning
Tensai Unkoman Bojou
episode.summary: First, a Sket fractured fairy tail pits crab (Himeko) versus devious monkey (Switch), with Bossun thrown in as a piece of crap. Meanwhile, in continuity, when Date becomes an enka singer overnight, can the Sket-dan bring him back to his normal visual-kei self?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: より良い学園作りの為に!!
To Build a Better Academy
Yoriyoi Gakuen-zukuri no Tame ni!!
episode.summary: Katou Kiri has become Tsubaki`s loyal retainer, but will the young ninja learn to work together with his other Student Council colleagues in order to build a better academy? Then, the Sket-dan teams up with the Student Council to cure Usami of her hatred for all men... and it involves more than one kind of cross-dressing... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: SOLITUDE
Solitude
Solitude
episode.summary: When a bullying teacher from Katou Kiri`s past comes to Kaimei Academy, he harasses the Sket-dan. But will the bully`s actions push Student Council member/trained ninja Katou over the edge? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フードファイターお宅訪問!
Food Fighter Home Visit!
Food Fighter Otaku Houmon!
episode.summary: Bossun, Himeko, and Tsubaki get a huge surprise when they visit Mimorin`s house. Then, the old ramen guy from episode 29 is back for revenge! This time, his Food Fight uses Western-style food and Bossun feels obliged to participate! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覗き... しりそめし頃に...
The Time I Fully Came to Know Peeping
Nozoki... Shirisomeshi Koro ni...
episode.summary: A Peeping Tom is the latest miscreant to plague the students of Kaimei Academy. After that business is resolved, it`s Roman and Bossun versus the president and vice president of the Boys` Manga Club in a manga artist free-for-all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影狼を追え!
Chase Kagerou!
Kagerou o Oe!
episode.summary: Kagerou, a ninja-like purse and wallet-snatching thief, plagues the students of Kaimei Academy. Can the Sket-dan stop him or will it take a ninja to catch a ninja? Over at the Student Council, President Tsubaki is trying to get used to his position, a task made harder when it appears the new treasurer is off her rocker. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学園のSKET達(その後)
The Academy`s Helpers (After That)
Gakuen no SKET-tachi (Sono Ato)
episode.summary: In this final episode, the Sket-dan does what it does best... help the students of Kaimei Academy! But there`s also time for potential romance, as Saaya sets her mind on declaring her true feelings... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スローライフ パトリッシュ
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Slow Life Battlish
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Magical Swindler Reality Maji as sung by Otakura-kun
誓いの白球
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Vow of the White Ball
カ? ロンスカ? ロックンロール -
SKET Dance Chibi Special - What? Ron? Rock`n Roll
置き物ラプソディ
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Figurehead`s Rhapsody
君が好き
SKET Dance Chibi Special - I Love You
お気になさらすお気持ちです
SKET Dance Chibi Special - An Uneasy Feeling
おかると あらかると
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Occult a la Carte
全開! 乙女フィルタ
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Full Throttle! Maiden Filter
武士節~もののふぶし~
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Samurai Tune Warrior Melody
SKET Dance Chibi Special - All Things, All Need
SKET Dance Chibi Special - Smile and Smash
集中ビュビュビューン!
